remarks:
'Less than or equal to' expressed in terms of 'less than'.  (Contributed by NM, 13-May-1999.) 

---

 'Less than or equal to' expressed in terms of 'less than'.  Part of definition 11.2.7(vi) of [HoTT], p.  (varies).  (Contributed by NM, 13-May-1999.)
statement: lenlt $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A <_ B <-> -. B < A ) ) $.
